languages.text: "Это не мир династии фон Валанциус, а пограничная с протекторатом система. Империум зиждется на строгом и неукоснительном соблюдении {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}, и даже если подать сравнимо мала, она должна поставляться в надлежащем объеме".

traits.locale_text: "Это не мир династии фон Валанциус, а пограничная с протекторатом система. Империум зиждется на строгом и неукоснительном соблюдении Лекс Империалис, и даже если подать сравнимо мала, она должна поставляться в надлежащем объеме". {n}На последних словах Префект заходится глухим старческим кашлем.{/n}
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."
languages.original_text: "Это не мир династии фон Валанциус, а пограничная с протекторатом система. Империум зиждется на строгом и неукоснительном соблюдении {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g}, и даже если подать сравнимо мала, она должна поставляться в надлежащем объеме".

traits.locale_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the Lex Imperialis, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

"This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the Lex Imperialis, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the Lex Imperialis, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full." {n}The prefect barks out a dry cough.{/n}

The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

languages.text: « Il ne s'agit pas d'un monde appartenant aux von Valancius, le système en question se trouve à la périphérie de votre protectorat. Les fondations de l'Imperium reposent sur la stricte observance de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, et la dîme d'une planète, même de peu d'importance, doit être versée avec diligence et exactitude. »
languages.original_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne s'agit pas d'un monde appartenant aux von Valancius, le système en question se trouve à la périphérie de votre protectorat. Les fondations de l'Imperium reposent sur la stricte observance de la Lex Imperialis, et la dîme d'une planète, même de peu d'importance, doit être versée avec diligence et exactitude. »

« Il ne s'agit pas d'un monde appartenant aux von Valancius, le système en question se trouve à la périphérie de votre protectorat. Les fondations de l'Imperium reposent sur la stricte observance de la Lex Imperialis, et la dîme d'une planète, même de peu d'importance, doit être versée avec diligence et exactitude. »

languages.text: «No se trata de un mundo von Valancius: el sistema se encuentra justo en la frontera de su protectorado. El Imperium depende de la obediencia estricta e infalible de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, y el diezmo de un planeta, por pequeño que sea, debe proporcionarse siempre en su totalidad».
languages.original_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

traits.locale_text: «No se trata de un mundo von Valancius: el sistema se encuentra justo en la frontera de su protectorado. El Imperium depende de la obediencia estricta e infalible de la Lex Imperialis, y el diezmo de un planeta, por pequeño que sea, debe proporcionarse siempre en su totalidad».

«No se trata de un mundo von Valancius: el sistema se encuentra justo en la frontera de su protectorado. El Imperium depende de la obediencia estricta e infalible de la Lex Imperialis, y el diezmo de un planeta, por pequeño que sea, debe proporcionarse siempre en su totalidad».

languages.text: “那个世界并不属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，而那个星系也刚好位于您的王朝边境之外。帝国制定了严格的{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}律法{/g}，这正是整个帝国的基石。因此，即便是规模较小的行星，也必须全额缴纳应缴的什一税。”
languages.original_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

traits.locale_text: “那个世界并不属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，而那个星系也刚好位于您的王朝边境之外。帝国制定了严格的律法，这正是整个帝国的基石。因此，即便是规模较小的行星，也必须全额缴纳应缴的什一税。”
“那个世界并不属于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，而那个星系也刚好位于您的王朝边境之外。帝国制定了严格的律法，这正是整个帝国的基石。因此，即便是规模较小的行星，也必须全额缴纳应缴的什一税。”

languages.text: "Das ist keine Welt derer von Valancius ... das System liegt außerhalb der Grenzen Eures Protektorats. Das Imperium basiert auf der strikten Einhaltung des {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g}, und der Zehnt eines Planeten, egal, wie klein er auch sein mag, muss vollumfänglich erbracht werden."
languages.original_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist keine Welt derer von Valancius ... das System liegt außerhalb der Grenzen Eures Protektorats. Das Imperium basiert auf der strikten Einhaltung des Lex Imperia, und der Zehnt eines Planeten, egal, wie klein er auch sein mag, muss vollumfänglich erbracht werden."

"Das ist keine Welt derer von Valancius ... das System liegt außerhalb der Grenzen Eures Protektorats. Das Imperium basiert auf der strikten Einhaltung des Lex Imperia, und der Zehnt eines Planeten, egal, wie klein er auch sein mag, muss vollumfänglich erbracht werden."

languages.text: 「これはフォン・ヴァランシウス惑星ではありません―そのシステムはあなたの保護領のちょうど外側にあります。帝国は{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス・インペリア{/g}による厳格かつ間違いのない規則の遵守の上に成り立っており、惑星の租税はたとえ比較的わずかなものでも、完全に提供されなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

traits.locale_text: 「これはフォン・ヴァランシウス惑星ではありません―そのシステムはあなたの保護領のちょうど外側にあります。帝国はレックス・インペリアによる厳格かつ間違いのない規則の遵守の上に成り立っており、惑星の租税はたとえ比較的わずかなものでも、完全に提供されなければなりません」{n}総監は渇いた咳をする。{/n}
「これはフォン・ヴァランシウス惑星ではありません―そのシステムはあなたの保護領のちょうど外側にあります。帝国はレックス・インペリアによる厳格かつ間違いのない規則の遵守の上に成り立っており、惑星の租税はたとえ比較的わずかなものでも、完全に提供されなければなりません」

languages.text: "Söz konusu bir von Valancius dünyası değil. Sistem, protektora sınırlarınızın hemen ötesinde yer alıyor. İmparatorluk, {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex İmperialis'e{/g} sıkı sıkıya bağlılığı üzerine kurulmuştur ve ne boyutta olduğu fark etmeksizin gezegen aşarları kuruşu kuruşuna ödenmelidir."
languages.original_text: "This is not a von Valancius world — the system is located just outside the border of your protectorate. The Imperium is built upon strict and unfailing abidance by the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g}, and a planet's tithe, even one that is relatively small, must be provided in full."

traits.locale_text: "Söz konusu bir von Valancius dünyası değil. Sistem, protektora sınırlarınızın hemen ötesinde yer alıyor. İmparatorluk, Lex İmperialis'e sıkı sıkıya bağlılığı üzerine kurulmuştur ve ne boyutta olduğu fark etmeksizin gezegen aşarları kuruşu kuruşuna ödenmelidir."

"Söz konusu bir von Valancius dünyası değil. Sistem, protektora sınırlarınızın hemen ötesinde yer alıyor. İmparatorluk, Lex İmperialis'e sıkı sıkıya bağlılığı üzerine kurulmuştur ve ne boyutta olduğu fark etmeksizin gezegen aşarları kuruşu kuruşuna ödenmelidir."
